Summary: 12.07 am red glowing ball flew silently from my left to right 2 white lights of aircraft flying higer straight in my direction
divs: Sighting Detailsi was going out into my back garden it was 12.07am as i got to the french windows i saw 2 white lights coming towards me which was unmistakably an aircraft then out of the corner of my left eye i saw a red glowing ball crossing from my left to my right i opened the door and went out to stand on the steps the aircraft was just audible focussed on the red ball the aicfaft noise was gone and then silence the object was bright red with a yellowish tinge and seemed to waver around the edge i thought it might be a chinese lantern but it moved at around 20-30mph flew in a straight line certainly not something i had seen before i am under the fight path of heathrow inbound and outbound gatwick outbound and london city inbound so i am used to seeing aircraft i felt privilidged to be seeing this and went to bed after the event i lost sight of the object as it passed into the distance over rooftops heading in the direction of canary wharf and city airport
trends: There have been 154 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around October 3rd 2011
